import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import ReactRotatingText from "react-rotating-text"; import Container from "../components/Container"; const SocialLink = ({ link, text, handler, subText }) => ( {text} {(handler || subText) && ( ( {handler && ( {handler} )} {handler && subText && " - "} {subText}) )} ); const index = () => { return (

Hi,

I'm Dani Vijay

Your friendly neighborhood Full Stack Web Developer

I love working with JavaScript, there is a high chance of finding me working with MERN stack at the moment.

I've extensive work experience with ReactJS ( among top 10% in StackOverflow ), Node/ExpressJS, Ruby on Rails, MongoDB and MySQL.

I'm fascinated about new technologies, and love to add them to my arsenal for timely disposal. More than happy to learn stuff to improve projects that I'm working on.

I also have some experience because of this, with{" "}

In free time, I'll be fiddling with my side projects in{" "} , you may find me either in{" "} (DMs are always open) or{" "} . Occasional writing experiments can be found in Medium(https://medium.com/@danivijay) and Dev.to(https://dev.to/danivijay)

); }; export default index;
